title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 412.1 - Procedure before the county medical societies, and workers' compensation committees of county medical societies; appeals and reviews before the medical appeals unit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 412.1 - Procedure before the county medical societies, and workers' compensation committees of county medical societies; appeals and reviews before the medical appeals unit

State Regulations

All rules and procedures of the Medical Appeals Unit, Workers' Compensation Board, relating to the practice of medicine under the

Workers' Compensation Law, are hereby made applicable to the practice of
medicine under the Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law, to the extent that
such rules and procedures are not inconsistent with the Volunteer Ambulance

Workers' Benefit Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
412.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
